comments:
Version: 3.1.0
Build id: 200412210800

I have no steps to reproduce.  It is possible (but very unlikely) for the
adapter manager cache to be flushed while an adapter is being retrieved.  The
write operations are synchronized but the read operations are not.

Here is the exception i got:
